identity-providers-help.redirectURI: The redirect uri to use when configuring the identity provider.
identity-providers-help.clientId: The client identifier registered with the identity provider.
identity-providers-help.clientSecret: The client secret registered with the identity provider. This field is able to obtain its value from vault, use ${vault.ID} format.
identity-providers-help.displayOrder: Number defining order of the provider in GUI (for example, on Login page).
